item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Nikitas

****UPDATE****
After about 2 weeks of phone tag with the manager, I've been unable to finalize any sort of specials for the group (lesson learned). Sorry Guys!!!!! The good thing is the drinks at Nikitas are relatively cheap anyway and if memory serves me right, Mondays are 2 for 1 Martini nights.


Your contact is: Jeanie (203) 804-2199

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour @ Nikitas
